title: 2022-01-05 - Threat Intelligence Report- The Evolution of Doppel Spider from BitPaymer to Grief Ransomware
plain_text:
# Threat Intelligence Report: The Evolution of Doppel Spider from BitPaymer to Grief Ransomware

**[armor.com/resources/threat-intelligence/the-evolution-of-doppel-spider-from-bitpaymer-to-grief-ransomware/](https://www.armor.com/resources/threat-intelligence/the-evolution-of-doppel-spider-from-bitpaymer-to-grief-ransomware/)**

[Armor](https://www.armor.com/)

**[Threat Intelligence](https://www.armor.com/resources/?fwp_resource_type=threat-intelligence)**
**January 5, 2022**

In this report, Armor's Amer Elsad will dive deep and explore Grief operation and
development since it was first observed in July 2017 as BitPaymer, as well as compare the
different variants and partnerships with other threat actors and ransomware groups

[Download Report](https://cdn.armor.com/app/uploads/2022/01/2022-Q1-ThreatIntel-Final.pdf)

**Resource Center**
